nl.sense_os.service.storage

Class LocalStorage

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.sense_os.service.storage.LocalStorage

  • public class LocalStorage
extends java.lang.Object
    Storage for recent sensor data. The data is initially stored in the device's RAM memory. In case the memory becomes too full, the data is offloaded into a persistent database in the flash memory. This process is hidden to the end user, so you do not have to worry about which data is where.
    Author:
    Steven Mulder
    See Also:
    ParserUtils, SensorData.DataPoint
